step.action: Launch D:\silverlight\project\GIT\UIAClientAPI\UIAClientAPI\bin\Debug\keePass-2.09\\KeePass.exe
step.expectedResult: KeePass window appears.

step.action: Click "New..." button on the toolbar
step.expectedResult: The "Create New Password Database" dialog opens

step.action: Click "Save" button of the dialog
step.expectedResult: The "Create New Password Database" dialog closes

step.action: Click "OK" button of the dialog
step.expectedResult: The "Create New Password Database" dialog closes

step.action: Click "Yes" button on the KeePass dialog
step.expectedResult: "mono-a11y" entered in the "Master password" box

step.action: Click "OK" button of the dialog
step.expectedResult: The "Create New Password Database" dialog closes

step.action: Click "Add Entry" button on the toolstripbar
step.expectedResult: The "Add Entry" dialog appears

step.action: Input the "email" into the title edit
step.expectedResult: The "email" field is inputted into the "Notes" edit

step.action: Click "OK" button of the dialog
step.expectedResult: The "Create New Password Database" dialog closes

step.action: check GridPattern 's property :ColumnCount
step.expectedResult: the data grid 's ColumnCount should be 11

step.action: check GridPattern 's property :RowCount
step.expectedResult: the data grid 's RowCount should be 2

step.action: Click "Add Entry" button on the toolstripbar
step.expectedResult: The "Add Entry" dialog appears

step.action: Input the "shopping" into the title edit
step.expectedResult: The "shopping" field is inputted into the "Notes" edit

step.action: Click "OK" button of the dialog
step.expectedResult: The "Create New Password Database" dialog closes

step.action: check GridPattern 's property :ColumnCount
step.expectedResult: the data grid 's ColumnCount should be 11

step.action: check GridPattern 's property :RowCount
step.expectedResult: the data grid 's RowCount should be 3

step.action: Get the (0,0) element of the datagrid , check if it is "Sample Entry"
step.expectedResult: the (0,0) item in the datagrid should be Sample Entry

step.action: Check Horizontal scroll bar's HorizontallyScrollable is True
step.expectedResult: The scroll bar's HorizontallyScrollable is True

step.action: Check Horizontal scroll bar's HorizontalScrollPercent is 0.0
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's HorizontalScrollPercent should be 0.0

step.action: Check Horizontal scroll bar's HorizontalViewSize is 75.711159737417944
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's HorizontalViewSize should be 75.711159737417944

step.action: Check Horizontal scroll bar's VerticallyScrollable is false
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's VerticallyScrollable should be false

step.action: Check Horizontal scroll bar's VerticalScrollPercent is -1
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's VerticalScrollPercent should be -1

step.action: Check Horizontal scroll bar's VerticalViewSize is 100
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's VerticalViewSize should be 100

step.action: Use Scroll method give the horizotal Scrollbar a LargeIncrement
step.expectedResult: The horizotal Scrollbar increase large

step.action: Use Scroll method give the horizotal Scrollbar a SmallIncrement
step.expectedResult: The horizotal Scrollbar increase small

step.action: after the LargeIncrement and SmallIncrement the scroll's position is 100.0d
step.expectedResult: the scroll's position is 100.0d

step.action: Use Scroll method give the horizotal Scrollbar a SmalIDecrement
step.expectedResult: The horizotal Scrollbar decrease small

step.action: Use Scroll method give the horizotal Scrollbar a LargeDecrement
step.expectedResult: The horizotal Scrollbar decrease large

step.action: after the LargeDecrement and SmallDecrement the scroll's position is 0.0d
step.expectedResult: the scroll's position is 0.0d

step.action: Use SetScrollPercent method make the horizotal scrollbar move to (50, -1)
step.expectedResult: The horizotal Scrollbar move to (50, -1)

step.action: after the SetScrollPercent action the scroll's position is 54.054054054054056d
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's VerticallyScrollable should be 54.054054054054056d

step.action: Check the data grid's CurrentView is 1
step.expectedResult: the data grid 's CurrentViewProperty should be 1

step.action: Retrieves the first name "Icons" of the view pattern of the data grid
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's VerticallyScrollable should be 54.054054054054056d

step.action: Retrieves the supported name of the view pattern of the data grid, assert its value is one
step.expectedResult: The supported name's value of the view pattern of the data grid is one

step.action: Check the column of data grid
step.expectedResult: the column of data grid should be 0

step.action: Check the column span of data grid
step.expectedResult: the column span of data grid should be 1

step.action: Check the row of data grid
step.expectedResult: the row of data grid should be 0

step.action: Check the row span of data grid
step.expectedResult: the row span of data grid should be 1

step.action: Check the ContainingGrid of data grid
step.expectedResult: the ContainingGrid of data grid should be null

step.action: Check the TableItemColumn of the text in datagrid
step.expectedResult: the TableItemColumn of the text in datagrid should be 0

step.action: Check the TableItemColumnSpan of the text in datagrid
step.expectedResult: the TableItemColumnSpan of the text in datagrid should be 1

step.action: Check the TableItemContainingGrid of the text in datagrid
step.expectedResult: the TableItemContainingGrid of the text in datagrid should be dataGrid.AutomationElement

step.action: Check the TableItemRow of the text in datagrid
step.expectedResult: the TableItemRow of the text in datagrid should be 0

step.action: Check the TableItemRowHeaderItems of the text in datagrid
step.expectedResult: the TableItemRowHeaderItems of the text in datagrid should be none

step.action: Check the TableItemColumnHeaderItems of the text in datagrid
step.expectedResult: the TableItemColumnHeaderItems of the text in datagrid should be

step.action: Check the TableItemRowSpan of the text in datagrid
step.expectedResult: the TableItemRowSpan of the text in datagrid should be 1

step.action: Click "Tools" menu item on the menu bar
step.expectedResult: The sub menu of "Tools" appears

step.action: Click "Generate Password.." menu item on the sub menu
step.expectedResult: The Password Generator dialog appears

step.action: Select "Preview" Tab item Select the "Preview" tab item.
step.expectedResult: The "Preview" tab item appears

step.action: Use Scroll method give the vertical Scrollbar a LargeIncrement
step.expectedResult: The vertical Scrollbar increase large

step.action: Use Scroll method give the vertical Scrollbar a LargeIncrement
step.expectedResult: The vertical Scrollbar increase large

step.action: after the SetScrollPercent action the scroll's position is 100.0d
step.expectedResult: The vertical scroll bar's Vertically Scrollable should be 100.0d

step.action: Use Scroll method give the vertical Scrollbar a LargeIncrement
step.expectedResult: The vertical Scrollbar increase large

step.action: Use Scroll method give the vertical Scrollbar a LargeIncrement
step.expectedResult: The horizotal vertical increase large

step.action: after the SetScrollPercent action the scroll's position is 0.0d
step.expectedResult: The vertical scroll bar's VerticallyScrollable should be 0.0d

step.action: Use SetScrollPercent method make the horizotal scrollbar move to (-1, 50)
step.expectedResult: The horizotal Scrollbar move to (-1, 50)

step.action: after the SetScrollPercent action the scroll's position is 50.0d
step.expectedResult: The Horizontal scroll bar's VerticallyScrollable should be 50.0d

step.action: click the Close button
step.expectedResult: The "Password Generator" dialogue disappears

step.action: Minimize "NewDatabase.kdbx*-KeePass Password Safe" Window to (50, 50)
step.expectedResult: NewDatabase.kdbx*-KeePass Password Safe" Window is minimize to (50, 50)
